overview: Akmal had promised his mother that he was getting married this time but he had not met the girl of his choice so far. It's all because of two things: 1) He wants a beautiful girl 2) He doesn't look attractive. Desperate to have a girlfriend, Akmal has taken to using makeup to make his face look good. But the unexpected was that he had turned into a beautiful woman. Now Akmal is facing new problems when many men fall in love with him.
title: Salah Susuk Raya
